TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextAnchor extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示批注所锚定到的内容选择。

span.span: Represents a selection of content that an annotation is anchored to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回的对象类型如果你使用粘滞便笺和流或固定的文档中突出显示内容。 is the object type of the returned if you are using sticky notes and highlights in flow or fixed documents. 中引入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 请考虑具有注释窗格一个简单的文档读取器应用程序。Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane. 注释窗格可能是一个列表框，用于显示锚定到文档的批注列表的文本。The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document. 如果用户在列表框中选择一项，应用程序将显示相应的批注对象所锚定到的文档段落。If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to. 下面的示例演示如何实现充当注释窗格的此类列表框的事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#handler)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#handler)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BoundingEnd As ContentPosition

summary.span: 获取文本锚点的结束位置。

span.span: Gets the end position of the text anchor.
The end position of the text anchor.

summary.span: 获取文本锚点的开始位置。

span.span: Gets the beginning position of the text anchor.
The beginning position of the text anchor.
